title: Deep_Q_networkdate: 2022/10/14tag: Deep Q NetworkDefinition:deep q network 融合了神经网络和Q learning。
 q learning我们使用表格来存储每一个状态 state, 和在这个 state 每个行为 action 所拥有的 Q 值.

title: first post
content:
WEEK 4 UXModelling Requirement
informal method:
user stories

user cases

personas Definition: A Persona Is a fictional character created to convey(传递) a certain set of user properties and behaviours to a technical recipient(接受者)

scenarios
 Definition: A Scenario is a detailed description of the user’s interaction with the computer
 scenarios can be used to clarify issues and implications of system development when there is no other way to do so.


semi-formal method
wireframe（线框)线框图很简单，通常是手绘的，是拟议用户界面的草图
mock-up and story board模型和故事板只是线框的延伸，但在骨架上有更多的肉.同样，模型和故事板都可能以手绘草图的形式出现，或者以计算机生成的界面元素的形式出现。它们大多不具备运行真正代码的能力——主要是为它们的视觉外观和感觉而呈现——实际上，它们主要位于线框和“原型”之间。与线框一样，模型大多是一个单独的界面屏幕或组件(或松散相关的一系列屏幕)，然后可以进行讨论

title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
One day, absolutely. Machines will, given enough time, do everything we do today. We will move on to do other things.
But don’t hold your breath.
